column1: 10 pts - Great job identifying the business function and providing a clear explanation of how scrum/sprint could operate for that function. Keep up the good work!

Rating: 12/12

Comment: Excellent job! You provided a clear and comprehensive explanation of how scrum/sprint could operate for the chosen business function. Keep up the great work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit

Comment: Good attempt at explaining why kanban may not be suitable, but could use more specific details related to the function. Keep up the good work!

10 pts - Great job identifying the production function as the one that could benefit the most from implementing kanban methodologies. Your explanation of how kanban could operate for this function is clear and well-organized. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job in explaining the process and its benefits for the chosen business function. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good effort in discussing the poor fit of scrum/sprint for production, but it could be more specific and clear. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation

Great job identifying confirmation bias as a potential issue in Jackson's decision-making process. Keep up the good work!

10/10

Great job defining confirmation bias and providing relevant advice to address it in decision-making. Keep up the good work!

Rating: 10 pts

Comment: Good job on describing the possible problems and solutions, but some details could be clearer. Keep up the good work!
8/10 - Your description of the possible steps and actions is reasonable but could use a bit more detail. Keep up the good work!
